column2: Fix JFlex's Action.GENERAL_LOOK lookahead option to work with --charAt and --sliceandcharat

column3: The if block that handled Action.GENERAL_LOOK was assuming zzBufferL was an array and accessing zzBufferL.length and zzBufferL[]. If JFlex was used with the --charAt and --sliceandcharat options, the generated code would not compile since zzBufferL would be a CharSequence.
I'm guessing JetBrains already has this fix internally since the checked in _GroovyLexer.java references zzBufferL.length() appropriately.
Thanks George! We've merged in the pull request manually.
